import React,{useState}from'react';import{v4 as uuidV4}from'uuid';import toast from'react-hot-toast';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Home=()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();const[roomId,setRoomId]=useState('');const[username,setUsername]=useState('');const createNewRoom=e=>{e.preventDefault();const id=uuidV4();setRoomId(id);toast.success('Created a new room');};const joinRoom=()=>{if(!roomId||!username){toast.error('ROOM ID & username is required');return;}// Redirect
